lead_paragraph: Marlon Samuels was hardly magnanimous in victory as the temperamental West Indian batsman sat down to face the media  after his team's World Twenty20 victory -- feet on the table, batting pads still on.

headline.print_headline: Samuels Takes Pot-Shots at Stokes, Warne After World T20 Win
headline.main: Samuels Takes Pot-Shots at Stokes, Warne After World T20 Win

snippet: Marlon Samuels was hardly magnanimous in victory as the temperamental West Indian batsman sat down to face the media  after his team's World Twenty20 victory -- feet on the table, batting pads still on....
